attributes.action: As a Briton, I demand that you defend us against those who wish to harm us.
attributes.additional_details: You have a nation of very angry people and voters. You really need to decide which side you are on!
attributes.background: It's really the Elephant in the room. People are being invited into our Country and invited to run it, by YOU the elected Government. Who wish to harm our Country and our culture. You were voted in to represent us. So do so!

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
